snippet: Shares of Lululemon Athletica fell over 16 percent as results showed margins had narrowed because of higher costs even as the company reported consensus-beating sales.
abstract: Shares of Lululemon Athletica fall more than 16 percent after fourth-quarter results show narrowing margins.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Lululemon Athletica fell over 16 percent as results showed margins had narrowed because of higher costs even as the company reported consensus-beating sales.

headline.print_headline: Lululemon Margins Tighten, and Its Shares Drop 16%
headline.main: Lululemon Margins Tighten, and Its Shares Drop 16%
